text: With party leaders often making a single in-person campaign stop each day due to COVID-19, where candidates choose to go could say a lot about party strategies. Here, we’ve mapped every appearance made by the candidates. Updated daily.
Horgan and Wilkinson have criss-crossed the vote-rich Lower Mainland throughout the campaign.
While Furstenau has focused her campaign around Victoria and her base in the Cowichan Valley.
Both Horgan and Wilkinson have traveled north to Kitimat and east to the Kootenays and the interior...
... but these were some of the only stops outside of the Lower Mainland.
